description: Try our easy to follow Barbecued Chicken & Avocado Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Barbecued Chicken & Avocado Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Brush pizza base with oil and top with cheese and chicken. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until base is crisp. Remove from oven and top with avocado and coriander. Drizzle over sauce and serve immediately.
